price: Anapo somewa Aya zetu, husema: Hizi ni simulizi za uwongo za watu wa zamani!
arabic: إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
footnotes: Akisomewa Qur'ani husema: Hivi ni visa vya uwongo vya watu wa kale!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: idhā tut'lā ʿalayhi āyātunā qāla asāṭīru al-awalīna
